typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DateKey as long,
		Date as date,
		Date_Name as string,
		Year as timestamp,
		Year_Name as string,
		Quarter as timestamp,
		Quarter_Name as string,
		Month as timestamp,
		Month_Name as string,
		Day_Of_Year as integer,
		Day_Of_Year_Name as string,
		Day_Of_Quarter as integer,
		Day_Of_Quarter_Name as string,
		Day_Of_Month as integer,
		Day_Of_Month_Name as string,
		Month_Of_Year as integer,
		Month_Of_Year_Name as string,
		Month_Of_Quarter as integer,
		Month_Of_Quarter_Name as string,
		Quarter_Of_Year as integer,
		Quarter_Of_Year_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Year as timestamp,
		Fiscal_Year_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Quarter as timestamp,
		Fiscal_Quarter_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Month as timestamp,
		Fiscal_Month_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Day as timestamp,
		Fiscal_Day_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Day_Of_Year as integer,
		Fiscal_Day_Of_Year_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Day_Of_Quarter as integer,
		Fiscal_Day_Of_Quarter_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Day_Of_Month as integer,
		Fiscal_Day_Of_Month_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Month_Of_Year as integer,
		Fiscal_Month_Of_Year_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Month_Of_Quarter as integer,
		Fiscal_Month_Of_Quarter_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Quarter_Of_Year as integer,
		Fiscal_Quarter_Of_Year_Name as string,
		Fiscal_Quarter_End as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SRCDate
source(output(
		PeriodDate as date,
		AccountNumber as string,
		LoanType as string,
		NominalRate as decimal(18,9),
		RateCode as string,
		FundingTerm as integer,
		ElapsedTerm as integer,
		MonthsInArrears as integer,
		BusinessProduct as string,
		Fundingyear as integer,
		GrossBalance as decimal(18,9),
		Installment as decimal(18,9),
		TotalAccuredincome as decimal(18,9),
		LedgerAdjustments as decimal(18,9),
		NegativeBalanceAdjustments as decimal(18,9),
		DeferredTotal as decimal(18,9),
		Repayment as decimal(18,9),
		EAD as decimal(18,9),
		PropertyIndexOMV as decimal(18,9),
		Securityregion as string,
		SellingCostPercentage as decimal(18,9),
		EarlierCharges as decimal(18,9),
		OriginalAdvance as decimal(18,9)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SRCMonthlyTransactions
source(output(
		AccountKey as integer,
		AccountNaturalKey as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		Tarifftype as string,
		AccountStatus as string,
		AccountType as string,
		CurrentTariffType as string,
		CurrentAccountStatus as string,
		CurrentAccountType as string,
		RowStartDate as timestamp,
		RowEndDate as timestamp,
		RowIscurrent as integer,
		InsertedAuditKey as integer,
		UpdatedAuditKey as integer,
		AccountSource as string,
		IsCBTL as boolean,
		CurrentIsCBTL as boolean,
		RepaymentStrategy as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SRCAccount
source(output(
		BaseRateKey as integer,
		BaseRateTypeName as string,
		BaseRateCode as string,
		BaseRate as string,
		AuditKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SRCBaseRate
source(output(
		BusinessProductKey as integer,
		BusinessProduct as string,
		BusinessProductGroup as string,
		BusinessProductDescription as string,
		BusinessProductVariant as string,
		ForecastVariant as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SRCBusinessProduct
source(output(
		reportCounty as string,
		region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SRCStagingReferenceRegionLookup
source(output(
		LoanTypeKey as integer,
		LoanType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SRCLoanType
SRCDate, SRCMonthlyTransactions join(Date == PeriodDate,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DateJoin
SRCAccount, DateJoin join(SRCAccount@AccountNumber == SRCMonthlyTransactions@AccountNumber,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AccountJoin
AccountJoin, SRCBaseRate join(RateCode == BaseRateCode,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> BaseRateJoin
BaseRateJoin, SRCBusinessProduct join(SRCMonthlyTransactions@BusinessProduct == BusinessProductGroup,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> BusinessProductJoin
BusinessProductJoin, SRCStagingReferenceRegionLookup join(Securityregion == region,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RegionJoin
RegionJoin, SRCLoanType join(SRCMonthlyTransactions@LoanType == SRCLoanType@LoanType,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LoanTypeJoin
LoanTypeJoin sink(input(
		PeriodDateKey as integer,
		AccountNumberKey as integer,
		LoanTypeKey as integer,
		NominalRate as decimal(18,9),
		RateCodeKey as integer,
		FundingTerm as integer,
		ElapsedTerm as integer,
		MonthsInArrears as integer,
		BusinessProductKey as integer,
		Fundingyear as integer,
		GrossBalance as decimal(18,9),
		Installment as decimal(18,9),
		TotalAccuredincome as decimal(18,9),
		LedgerAdjustments as decimal(18,9),
		NegativeBalanceAdjustments as decimal(18,9),
		DeferredTotal as decimal(18,9),
		Repayment as decimal(18,9),
		EAD as decimal(18,9),
		PropertyIndexOMV as decimal(18,9),
		Securityregion as string,
		SellingCostPercentage as decimal(18,9),
		EarlierCharges as decimal(18,9),
		OriginalAdvance as decimal(18,9)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		PeriodDateKey = DateKey,
		AccountNumberKey = AccountKey,
		LoanTypeKey,
		NominalRate,
		RateCodeKey = BaseRateKey,
		FundingTerm,
		ElapsedTerm,
		MonthsInArrears,
		BusinessProductKey,
		Fundingyear,
		GrossBalance,
		Installment,
		TotalAccuredincome,
		LedgerAdjustments,
		NegativeBalanceAdjustments,
		DeferredTotal,
		Repayment,
		EAD,
		PropertyIndexOMV,
		Securityregion,
		SellingCostPercentage,
		EarlierCharges,
		OriginalAdvance
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DESTFactFinancialReporting
